meanings.definition: A person or thing that infuses.
meanings.sent1: The tea infuser added flavor to the hot water.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new infuser for my loose leaf tea.
meanings.sent3: The infuser in the kitchen drawer always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an infuser of joy into our hearts.
meanings.sent5: The infuser, like a magic wand, transformed the plain water into a delicious drink.

meanings.definition: A device used to infuse flavors into liquids.
meanings.sent1: The infuser slowly released the aroma of herbs into the soup.
meanings.sent2: She used an infuser to make her own flavored oils.
meanings.sent3: The infuser looked like a tiny spaceship in the cup.
meanings.sent4: The infuser worked its magic, turning the water into a fragrant potion.
meanings.sent5: With the infuser, the drink became a burst of fruity delight.

meanings.definition: A person who infuses ideas or emotions into others.
meanings.sent1: As a teacher, she was an infuser of knowledge and inspiration.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the infuser of positivity in the office.
meanings.sent3: The infuser of creativity struck again with a brilliant idea.
meanings.sent4: Her words were an infuser of courage in times of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The infuser of hope never failed to uplift those around him.
